    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean acceptOrder(Order order)
      The courier accepts an order, setting it to its current order, changing his state to OnDuty, calculating the delivery date estimation and adding 1 to the num of orders completed
      void addNewOrder(Order order)
      Adds an order to the list of pending orders of a courier.
      static java.util.Comparator<Courier> compareDeliveryDate()
      Comparator used to sort couriers in the processOrders function by comparing their delivery time of their current order.
      static java.util.Comparator<Courier> compareDistance()
      Comparator use to sort couriers in the Delivery Fastest Policy depending on their distance to the restaurant
      static java.util.Comparator<Courier> compareNumOrders()
      Comparator used to sort couriers in the Delivery Fair Occupation Policy depending on their number of completed orders.
      boolean decideAddOrder(Order order)
      Function that simulates the reaction of a courier to an order: assigns a probability of 1% that the courier will decline to add the order to its list of pending orders and calls the functions acceptOrder or refuseOrder accordingly.
      boolean decideTakingOrder(Order order)
      Function that simulates the reaction of a courier to an order: assigns a probability of 5% that the courier will decline the order and calls the functions acceptOrder or refuseOrder accordingly.

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:

      • compareDistance

        public static java.util.Comparator<Courier> compareDistance()
        Comparator use to sort couriers in the Delivery Fastest Policy depending on their distance to the restaurant
        Returns:
        a comparator that compares couriers based on the attribute distanceToRest

      • compareNumOrders

        public static java.util.Comparator<Courier> compareNumOrders()
        Comparator used to sort couriers in the Delivery Fair Occupation Policy depending on their number of completed orders.
        Returns:
        a comparator that compares couriers based on the attribute countOfOrdersCompleted

      • compareDeliveryDate

        public static java.util.Comparator<Courier> compareDeliveryDate()
        Comparator used to sort couriers in the processOrders function by comparing their delivery time of their current order. It allows to assign an order to a courier when all couriers are currently on duty
        Returns:
        a comparator that compares couriers based on the attribute deliveryDate of the object currentOrder

      • addNewOrder

        public void addNewOrder(Order order)
        Adds an order to the list of pending orders of a courier.
        Parameters:
        order - the order that wants to be added.

      • acceptOrder

        public boolean acceptOrder(Order order)
        The courier accepts an order, setting it to its current order, changing his state to OnDuty, calculating the delivery date estimation and adding 1 to the num of orders completed
        Parameters:
        order - the order to be accepted
        Returns:
        TRUE, as it is used in the function decideAddOrder that decides whether or not to accept the order

      • refuseOrder

        public boolean refuseOrder()
        The courier refuses to take an order
        Returns:
        FALSE

      • decideTakingOrder

        public boolean decideTakingOrder(Order order)
        Function that simulates the reaction of a courier to an order: assigns a probability of 5% that the courier will decline the order and calls the functions acceptOrder or refuseOrder accordingly.
        Parameters:
        order - the order to be accepted of refused
        Returns:
        TRUE if the order is accepted and FALSE if refused

      • decideAddOrder

        public boolean decideAddOrder(Order order)
        Function that simulates the reaction of a courier to an order: assigns a probability of 1% that the courier will decline to add the order to its list of pending orders and calls the functions acceptOrder or refuseOrder accordingly.
        Parameters:
        order - the order to be added to the list of pending orders of a courier
        Returns:
        TRUE if the order is added and FALSE if not
